001/*

006
007package renderer.pipeline;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import static renderer.pipeline.PipelineLogger.*;
012
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Optional;
016
017/**
018   Clip in camera space any {@link Primitive} that crosses
019   the camera's near clipping plane {@code z = -near}.
020*/
021public class NearClip
022{
023   public static boolean doNearClipping = true;
024   public static boolean debug = false;
025
026   /**
027      Start with a {@link Model} that contains {@link Primitive}s
028      that have been transformed into camera space.
029   <p>
030      If a transformed {@link Primitive} crosses the camera's
031      near plane, then replace that {@link Primitive}, in the
032      {@link Model}'s list of primitives, with one that has been
033      clipped so that it lies completely in the far side of the
034      camera's near plane (the side of the near plane away from
035      the camera).
036   <p>
037      If a transformed {@link Primitive} is completely in the
038      camera side of the near plane, then drop that
039      {@link Primitive} from the {@link Model}'s list of primitives.
040   <p>
041      Return a {@link Model} for which every {@link Primitive} is
042      completely on the far side of the camera's near plane.
043
044      @param model   {@link Model} containing {@link Primitive}s transformed into camera space
045      @param camera  {@link Camera} that determines the near clipping plane
046      @return a {@link Model} containing {@link Primitive}s clipped to the camera's near plane
047   */
048   public static Model clip(final Model model, final Camera camera)
049   {
050      if (! doNearClipping)
051      {
052         return model;
053      }
054
055      // Replace the model's list of colors with a shallow copy.
056      final Model model2 =  new Model(model.vertexList,
057                                      model.primitiveList,
058                                      new ArrayList<>(model.colorList),
059                                      model.name,
060                                      model.getMatrix(),
061                                      model.nestedModels,
062                                      model.textureList,
063                                      model.texCoordList,
064                                      model.visible,
065                                      model.doBackFaceCulling,
066                                      model.frontFacingIsCCW,
067                                      model.facesHaveTwoSides);
068
069      final List<Primitive> newPrimitiveList = new ArrayList<>();
070
071      for (final Primitive p : model2.primitiveList)
072      {
073         logPrimitive("7. Near_Clipping", model2, p);
074
075         final List<Primitive> p_clipped;
076
077         if (p instanceof LineSegment)
078         {
079            p_clipped = NearClip_Line.clip(model2, (LineSegment)p, camera);
080         }
081         else if (p instanceof Points)
082         {
083            p_clipped = NearClip_Points.clip(model2, (Points)p, camera);
084         }
085         else // if (p instanceof Triangle)
086         {
087            p_clipped = NearClip_Triangle.clip(model2, (Triangle)p, camera);
088         }
089
090         if ( ! p_clipped.isEmpty() )
091         {
092            // Keep the primitives that are visible.
093            for (final Primitive p2 : p_clipped)
094            {
095               newPrimitiveList.add( p2 );
096               logPrimitive("7. Near_Clipped (accept)", model2, p2);
097            }
098         }
099         else
100         {
101            // Discard the primitives that are not visible.
102            logPrimitive("7. Near_Clipped (reject)", model2, p);
103         }
104      }
105
106      // Replace the model's original list of line segments
107      // with the list of clipped line segments.
108      return new Model(model2.vertexList,  // has been updated with clipped vertices
109                       newPrimitiveList,   // clipped primitives
110                       model2.colorList,   // has been updated with interpolated colors
111                       model2.name,
112                       model2.getMatrix(),
113                       model2.nestedModels,
114                       model2.textureList,
115                       model2.texCoordList,
116                       model2.visible,
117                       model2.doBackFaceCulling,
118                       model2.frontFacingIsCCW,
119                       model2.facesHaveTwoSides);
120   }
121
122
123
124   // Private default constructor to enforce noninstantiable class.
125   // See Item 4 in "Effective Java", 3rd Ed, Joshua Bloch.
126   private NearClip() {
127      throw new AssertionError();
128   }
129}
